- [93mBlock[0m [93mcopolymers[0m by [93msequential[0m [93mgroup[0m [93mtransfer[0m [93mpolymerization[0m: [93mpoly[0m([93mmethyl[0m [93mmethacrylate[0m)‐<[93mi[0m>[93mblock[0m</[93mi[0m>‐[93mpoly[0m([93m2[0m‐[93methylhexyl[0m [93macrylate[0m) and [93mpoly[0m([93mmethyl[0m [93mmethacrylate[0m)‐<[93mi[0m>[93mblock[0m</[93mi[0m>‐[93mpoly[0m(<[93mi[0m>[93mtert[0m</[93mi[0m>‐[93mbutyl[0m [93macrylate[0m): [93mAbstract[0m [93mPoly[0m([93mmethyl[0m [93mmethacrylate[0m)‐ [93mblock[0m ‐[93mpoly[0m([93m2[0m‐[93methylhexyl[0m [93macrylate[0m) ([93mPMMA[0m‐ [93mblock[0m ‐[93mPEHA[0m) and [93mpoly[0m([93mmethyl[0m [93mmethacrylate[0m)‐ [93mblock[0m ‐[93mpoly[0m( [93mtert[0m ‐[93mbutyl[0m [93macrylate[0m) with a [93mmethacrylate[0m/[93macrylate[0m [93munit[0m [93mratio[0m of [93m1[0m:[93m1[0m and [93m1[0m:[93m3[0m, [93m16000[0m < [93mM[0m [93mn[0m < [93m44000[0m and [93m1[0m,[93m9[0m < [93mM[0m [93mw[0m / [93mM[0m [93mn[0m < [93m2[0m,[93m5[0m, were [93mprepared[0m by [93msequential[0m [93mgroup[0m [93mtransfer[0m [93mpolymerization[0m [93musing[0m ([93m1[0m‐[93mmethoxy[0m‐[93m2[0m‐[93mmethyl[0m‐[93m1[0m‐[93mpropenyloxy[0m)[93mtrimethylsilane[0m as [93minitiator[0m and [93mtetrabutylammonium[0m [93mfluoride[0m [93mmonohydrate[0m as a [93mcatalyst[0m in [93mtetrahydrofuran[0m at −[93m30[0m°[93mC[0m, [93mPMMA[0m being the [93mfirst[0m [93mblock[0m. The [93mincrease[0m in [93mM[0m [93mn[0m during the [93msuccessive[0m [93maddition[0m of [93mmonomers[0m is [93mlinearly[0m [93mdependent[0m on the ([93mco[0m)[93mpolymer[0m [93myield[0m and [93msize[0m‐[93mexclusion[0m [93mchromatography[0m ([93mSEC[0m) [93mcurves[0m are [93mshifted[0m [93mtowards[0m [93mhigher[0m [93mmolecular[0m [93mweights[0m in [93mcomparison[0m with [93mPMMA[0m [93mmacroinitiators[0m. The [93mblock[0m [93mstructure[0m of the [93mcopolymers[0m was [93malso[0m [93mproven[0m by [93mextraction[0m [93mexperiments[0m. The [93mpresence[0m of [93mhomopolymers[0m in the [93mcopolymers[0m was not [93mdetected[0m. When the [93mformer[0m [93mcopolymer[0m is [93mprepared[0m in a [93mreverse[0m [93mway[0m ([93mPEHA[0m [93msegment[0m being the [93mfirst[0m), the [93mMMA[0m [93mpolymerization[0m [93mceases[0m at ≈ [93m43[0m–[93m45[0m% [93mconversion[0m.
- [93mHigh[0m-[93mthroughput[0m [93msynthesis[0m of [93mmulti[0m-[93melement[0m [93malloy[0m [93mnanoparticles[0m [93musing[0m [93msolvothermal[0m [93mcontinuous[0m-[93mflow[0m [93mreactor[0m.: [93mHigh[0m-[93mthroughput[0m [93msynthesis[0m of [93mmulti[0m-[93melement[0m [93malloy[0m [93mnanoparticles[0m ([93mMEA[0m [93mNPs[0m) is [93messential[0m for [93maccelerating[0m the [93mdiscovery[0m of [93madvanced[0m [93mmaterials[0m with [93mcomplex[0m [93mcompositions[0m. [93mHerein[0m, [93mwe[0m [93mdeveloped[0m an [93mautomated[0m [93mcontinuous[0m-[93mflow[0m [93mreactor[0m [92msystem[0m [93mcapable[0m of [93msynthesising[0m a [93mwide[0m [93mvariety[0m of [93mMEA[0m [93mNPs[0m under [93mcontrolled[0m [93msolvothermal[0m [93mconditions[0m (up to [93m400[0m °[93mC[0m and [93m35[0m [93mMPa[0m). The [92msystem[0m [93mdemonstrates[0m a [93mhigh[0m [93mscreening[0m [93mthroughput[0m, [93mcapable[0m of [93mpreparing[0m up to [93m20[0m [93mdistinct[0m [93msamples[0m in a [93msingle[0m, [93mautomated[0m [93mrun[0m, with [93meach[0m [93msynthesis[0m [93mrequiring[0m only [93m30[0m [93mminutes[0m. A [93mkey[0m [93mthroughput[0m [93moptimising[0m [93mfeature[0m is the [93mparallel[0m [93mprocess[0m [93mexecution[0m, [93mwhereby[0m [93mprecursor[0m [93mpreparation[0m and [92msystem[0m [93mcleaning[0m are [93mperformed[0m [93mconcurrently[0m [93mvia[0m the [93mreactor[0m [93mheating[0m, [93msynthesis[0m, and [93mcooling[0m [93mcycles[0m. [93mAll[0m [93mwashing[0m [93mprocedures[0m, for [93mboth[0m the [93mprecursor[0m [93mpreparation[0m [93mmodule[0m and [93mreactor[0m [93munit[0m, are [93mfully[0m [93mautomated[0m, [93mfurther[0m [93mminimising[0m [93mdowntime[0m. [93mWe[0m [93mdemonstrated[0m its [93mversatility[0m by [93msuccessfully[0m [93msynthesising[0m a [93mwide[0m [93mrange[0m of [93mMEA[0m [93mNPs[0m, [93mincluding[0m [93mhigh[0m-[93mentropy[0m [93malloys[0m, [93mcomposed[0m of [93mvarious[0m [93mcombinations[0m of [93md[0m- and [93mp[0m-[93mblock[0m [93mmetals[0m. The [93msynthesized[0m [93mmaterials[0m, [93mranging[0m from [93mbimetallic[0m [93mRuPd[0m to [93mten[0m-[93melement[0m [93mCoNiCuRuRhPdInSnIrPt[0m [93malloys[0m, were [93mall[0m [93mcrystalline[0m, [93msingle[0m-[93mphase[0m [93mface[0m-[93mcentred[0m [93mcubic[0m [93msolid[0m [93msolutions[0m. [93mFurthermore[0m, the [92mplatform[0m [93menables[0m the [93mdirect[0m [93mone[0m-[93mstep[0m [93msynthesis[0m of [93msupported[0m [93mMEA[0m [93mcatalysts[0m, [93msuch[0m as [93mRuRhPdIrPt[0m/[33mCeO[0m [93m2[0m . For this [93msupported[0m [93mcatalyst[0m, [93mwe[0m [93machieved[0m a [93mpractical[0m [93mmass[0m [93mthroughput[0m with a [93mtheoretical[0m [93mproduction[0m [93mrate[0m of [93m0[0m.[93m5[0m [93mg[0m [93mh[0m -[93m1[0m for the [93mMEA[0m [93mNPs[0m ([93mcorresponding[0m to [93m27[0m [93mg[0m [93mh[0m -[93m1[0m for the [93mtotal[0m [93mcatalyst[0m [93mincluding[0m the [93msupport[0m). The [93mfinal[0m [93mproduct[0m [93myield[0m was [93mapproximately[0m [93m56[0m% under the [93mcurrent[0m [93mprotocol[0m, which is [93mdesigned[0m to [93mprevent[0m [93mcross[0m-[93mcontamination[0m by [93mautomatically[0m [93mdiscarding[0m the [93minitial[0m and [93mfinal[0m [93mportions[0m of the [93mproduct[0m [93mslurry[0m. [93mWe[0m [93manticipate[0m this [93myield[0m [93mcan[0m be [93mreadily[0m [93mimproved[0m in a [92msystem[0m [93mconfiguration[0m [93moptimized[0m for [93mmass[0m [93mthroughput[0m [93mrather[0m than for [93mhigh[0m-[93mthroughput[0m [93mscreening[0m. This [93mstudy[0m [93mpresents[0m a [93mscalable[0m and [93mversatile[0m [92msystem[0m for [93mhigh[0m-[93mthroughput[0m [93mMEA[0m [93mNPs[0m [93msynthesis[0m and [93moffers[0m a [93mpractical[0m [93msolution[0m for [93mbridging[0m the [93mgap[0m between [93mcomputational[0m [93mpredictions[0m and [93mexperimental[0m [93mmaterials[0m [93mdevelopment[0m.
- [93mPressure[0m-[93minduced[0m [93mredox[0m [93mreversal[0m of [93miron[0m and the [93mdistribution[0m of [93melements[0m in [93mdeep[0m [93mEarth[0m.: [93mWe[0m [93mdemonstrate[0m a [93mremarkable[0m [91mchange[0m in the [93mchemical[0m [93mbonding[0m of [93miron[0m under [93mpressure[0m that [93munderlies[0m the [93mdistribution[0m of [93melements[0m in the [93mEarth[0m'[93ms[0m [93mmantle[0m and [93mcore[0m. [93mUsing[0m a [93mmassive[0m-[93mscale[0m, [93mfirst[0m-[93mprinciples[0m [93mstudy[0m, [93mwe[0m [93mshow[0m that while [93mreacting[0m with [93mp[0m -[93mblock[0m [93melements[0m under [93mincreasing[0m [93mpressure[0m from [93mambient[0m to [93mEarth[0m [93mcore[0m [93mconditions[0m, [93miron[0m [93mtends[0m to [93mreverse[0m its [93mredox[0m [93mnature[0m, [93mchanging[0m from an [93melectron[0m [93mdonor[0m ([93mreductant[0m) to an [93melectron[0m [93macceptor[0m ([93moxidant[0m), and [93moxidizes[0m [93mmany[0m [93mp[0m -[93mblock[0m [93melements[0m. [93mSuch[0m [93mreverse[0m [93mredox[0m [93mpropensity[0m [93msignificantly[0m [93mimpacts[0m the [93mstoichiometries[0m, [93mbond[0m [93mtypes[0m and [93mstrengths[0m, [93mstructures[0m, and [93mproperties[0m of [93miron[0m [93mcompounds[0m under [93mdeep[0m [93mplanetary[0m [93mconditions[0m. This [91mchange[0m [93mtransforms[0m [93mmany[0m [93mp[0m- [93mblock[0m [93melements[0m ([93mconventionally[0m [93mlabeled[0m [93mlithophile[0m or [93mchalcophile[0m) into [93mhighly[0m [93msiderophile[0m [93mspecies[0m. The [93mchemical[0m [93mbinding[0m [93mstrengths[0m with [93miron[0m [93mshow[0m an [93minverse[0m [93mcorrelation[0m with the [93mdepletion[0m of [93mp[0m -[93mblock[0m [93melements[0m in the [93msilicate[0m [93mEarth[0m. [93mFurthermore[0m, [93msilicon[0m [93mshows[0m a [93mdistinct[0m [93manomaly[0m in its [93mbonding[0m to [93miron[0m, which [93msuggests[0m [93msilicon[0m [93mmay[0m [93mreadily[0m be [93mincorporated[0m into [93mEarth[0m'[93ms[0m [93mcore[0m.
- [93mSelf[0m-[93massociation[0m of [93mblock[0m [93mcopoly[0m([93moxyalkylene[0m)[93ms[0m in [93maqueous[0m [93msolution[0m. [93mEffects[0m of [93mcomposition[0m, [93mblock[0m [93mlength[0m and [93mblock[0m [92marchitecture[0m
- [93mNovel[0m [93mWell[0m-[93mdefined[0m [93mPolystyrene[0m-[93mblock[0m-[93mPoly[0m([93mlactide[0m-[93mco[0m-[93mglycolide[0m) [93mBlock[0m [93mCopolymers[0m: A [93mfacile[0m [93mpreparation[0m of [93mpolystyrene[0m-[93mblock[0m-[93mpoly[0m([93mlactide[0m-[93mco[0m-[93mglycolide[0m) [93mPS[0m-[93mb[0m-[93mPLGA[0m [93mblock[0m [93mcopolymers[0m was [93mreported[0m in [93mdetail[0m. [93mWell[0m-[93mdefined[0m [93mPS[0m-[93mb[0m-[93mPLGA[0m [93mblock[0m [93mcopolymers[0m were [93msuccessfully[0m [93mobtained[0m [93mvia[0m [93mliving[0m [93manionic[0m [93mpolymerization[0m and [93mring[0m-[93mopening[0m [93mpolymerization[0m. [93mFirst[0m, [93mhydroxyl[0m-[93mterminated[0m [93mlinear[0m [93mpolystyrenes[0m were [93mprepared[0m by [93mliving[0m [93manionic[0m [93mpolymerization[0m. The [93mresulting[0m [93mpolymers[0m were [93mused[0m as [93mmacroinitiators[0m for [93mring[0m-[93mopening[0m [93mcopolymerization[0m of [93mlactide[0m and [93mglycolide[0m in the [93mpresence[0m of the [93m1[0m,[93m8[0m-[93mdiazabicyclo[0m[[93m5[0m.[93m4[0m.[93m0[0m][93mundec[0m-[93m7[0m-[93mene[0m ([93mDBU[0m) as a [93mcatalyst[0m in [93mdichloromethane[0m at [93mambient[0m [93mtemperature[0m. [93mTransesterification[0m and [93mformation[0m of [93mDBU[0m-[93minitiated[0m [93mpolymers[0m were [93mminimized[0m by [93moptimizing[0m the [93mcatalyst[0m [93mconcentration[0m. [93mThree[0m [93mblock[0m [93mcopolymers[0m were [93msynthesized[0m in [93mvarious[0m [93mmolecular[0m [93mweights[0m from [93m5000[0m [93mg[0m/[93mmol[0m to [93m33600[0m [93mg[0m/[93mmol[0m with [93mlow[0m [93mpolydispersity[0m. The [93mformation[0m of [93mwell[0m-[93mdefined[0m [93mPS[0m-[93mb[0m-[93mPLGA[0m [93mblock[0m [93mcopolymers[0m was [93mfollowed[0m by [93mnuclear[0m [93mmagnetic[0m [93mresonance[0m [93mspectroscopy[0m and [93msize[0m-[93mexclusion[0m [93mchromatography[0m. [93mThermal[0m [93mproperties[0m of the [93mblock[0m [93mcopolymers[0m were [95minvestigated[0m by [93mthermal[0m [93mgravimetric[0m [93manalysis[0m and [93mdifferential[0m [93mscanning[0m [93mcalorimetry[0m. The [93mmorphology[0m of the [93mblock[0m [93mcopolymers[0m was [95minvestigated[0m [93musing[0m [93msmall[0m-[93mangle[0m [93mX[0m-[93mray[0m [93mscattering[0m in the [93mbulk[0m and [93mvia[0m [93mgrazing[0m [93mincidence[0m [93msmall[0m-[93mangle[0m [93mX[0m-[93mray[0m [93mscattering[0m as [93mwell[0m as [93matomic[0m [93mforce[0m [93mmicroscopy[0m in [93mthin[0m [93mfilm[0m [93mdemonstrating[0m [93morganized[0m [93mnanostructures[0m with [93muniform[0m [93mdomain[0m [93msizes[0m. [93mOverall[0m, this [93mmanuscript[0m [93mdescribes[0m an [93mexpanded[0m [93mpolymer[0m [93mtoolbox[0m for [93mPLGA[0m-[93mbased[0m [93mpolymers[0m for [93mnext[0m-[93mgeneration[0m [93mlithography[0m [93mapplications[0m.
